interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Clip in Hair Extensions - Platinum Blonde - Straight - 18in / 46cm - Full Head - 8 Pcs 120g - Japanese Heat Resistant Synthetic Hairpiece - Looks and Feels like Real Hair Review Date: 2015/01/26 Store: Elegant Hair Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '18 x 38.98 x 0.39 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SCIHLST20920', 'UPC': '799632432838'} Review Text: fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! Review Title: fantastic value for fake hair Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: Strong interest in hair extensions, particularly synthetic options that mimic the appearance and feel of real hair. Prefers straight styles and seeks products that provide a natural look.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: Specific preference for platinum blonde shades, especially with highlights. Values color accuracy and aesthetic appeal that complements bleached hair.

- **Product Characteristics**: Looks for high-quality, functional products—interested in items that are easy to apply and maintain, with a focus on softness, non-tangling features, and good blending capabilities with natural hair.

- **Value for Money**: Prioritizes products that offer good value; satisfied with purchases that provide a high-quality experience at a reasonable price.

- **Care Instructions**: Values clear usage and care guidelines, such as keeping products in storage bags when not in use and preparing hair before application.

Overall, this user exhibits a clear preference for effective, aesthetically pleasing hair extensions that are easy to use and maintain, coupled with an emphasis on quality and realistic appearance.
